title: Facebook connection
body: Did we ever get that mystery skin that they promised for being connected to Facebook with league?

replies.body: I don't believe we promised a mystery skin for connecting to Facebook.

* Unlock a Mystery **Champion** when you connect to Facebook friend discovery.

Champion.

Pretty lame considering a vast majority of people have all champions anyway.

It's like that one time a whole year's worth of positive behaviour got me a 520 RP skin for a champion that I never (read: NEVER) use.

Hey man!

Thats right we do have a new competition where you can unlock a new Mystery Champion when you reach the reward.

1) Would like to know a source on you saying that a majority of people have all the champions.

2) if you read the FAQ on the [Team up & Pool Party](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/team-up-pool-party) page you will see that if players do have all the champions they get something else! 

hope that clears things up!

So then you **did** promise a Mystery Skin for connecting to Facebook on the condition that you also own all Champions.

My source on saying that a majority of people have all champions comes from a survey I conducted as part of a paper I did a while ago with the sample merely consisting of the people on my friends list. It divided players into length of time playing the game to figure out the average time it took for players to obtain all champions in the game. The median score was between 1 and 2 seasons. I myself only took roughly 1.5 seasons to obtain all champions.

> So then you did promise a Mystery Skin for connecting to Facebook on the condition that you also own all Champions.

Not in the sense that JasonWazza is referring to. They are talking about when the facebook connection was introduced to the game, for which Riot promised a 4 win IP boost which should have already been given out to everyone who met the requirements.

As HeartVine said;

We never promised a Mystery Skin for connecting to Facebook.

We did promise a 4 win IP boost, which has already been awarded to players.
We did promise a Mystery Champion if players hit the milestone in Team up!

Hope that clears things up =)
I think you get Riot Girl Tristana for liking the facebook page.. don't know if that's the same as connecting though
Riot promised a 4 win IP boost (which was given out as far as I'm aware, received it on all my accounts) but no skin was promised.
that must have been it, I mostly brought it up because i recalled there being a thing for joining facebook, like the one in the Pool Party thing, but didn't recall getting it.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/team-up-pool-party
we do get a mystery champion at 25 million points. sucks for those that already own every champion.
you get a default velkoz skin for free, now you have two!
I want proof that they were ever gonna give us a mystery skin for connecting with facebook
